## Ì∫ò Introduction

Welcome to the **alx-backend-python** for the specialisation. This repo is designed to manage different backend Python projectcs that arae contained in  directories as per stated projects outlined. The instruction on how to run and interact with the program in a project are contained in the project's `README.md` file.

## Projects

- **0x00-python_variable_annotations**: This project deals with;
  - Type annotations in Python 3
  - How you can use type annotations to specify function signatures and - - - variable types
  - Duck typing
  - How to validate your code with mypy

## Running the Programs in repo

To run the projects in this repo:

1. **Prepare your environment:**

   Open a terminal (Command Prompt or PowerShell for Windows, Terminal for macOS or Linux)
   Ensure `Git` is installed

   Visit [https://git-scm.com](https://git-scm.com) to download and install `console Git` if not already installed

   Clone the repository

   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/Gideon-Phiri/alx-backend-python.git
   ```

   Navigate to the project directory of your choice

   ```sh
   cd project-name
   ```

   Follow the instruction in the `README.md` in that project directory

## Ì¥ù Feedback and Contributions

We've made every effort to implement all the main aspects of the app in the best possible way in every projects. However, the development journey doesn't end here, and your input is crucial for our continuous improvement.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Whether you have feedback on the projects, have encountered any bugs, or have suggestions for enhancements, we're eager to hear from you. Your insights help us make these projects more robust and user-friendly.

Please feel free to contribute by [submitting an issue](https://github.com/Gideon-Phiri/alx-backend-python.git/issues). Each contribution helps us grow and improve.

We appreciate your support and look forward to making our projects even better with your help!
